Keep it Handy

For keeping track of all your things, like the house, car, insurance, and even the list of things you need at the hardware store.

An app for families who love to save time and keep it together.

For families who want a simple and secure way to keep track of assets, related events and contacts and lists and everything else we wish we had in one place on all our devices.

For private information about the thing we love.

For sharing the details about what's going on with the house and the Internet and the guy who mows the yard and the password for Netflix.

Features at a glance

Calendar

For appointments, important dates and the big inspection.

Contacts

For the cable guy, electrician, and the name of that really smart agent.

Photos

For photo albums and videos of the befores and afters.

Notes

For taking note of progress and the funny things we learn from home improvement.

Documents

For the insurance forms, the home owners forms, the bills and receipts.

Lists

For what to buy, the furniture, the appliances, the tools, the electronics.

Stories

For the story about finding the perfect house and making it into a home.

Sharing

For sharing with Mom & Dad, your sibilings, and the in-laws.

Request an invite for the first comprehensive app designed for your family. Brought to you by Djed, from the heart of Austin, Texas.
